PerfectNetExp.abs: 天南星科 - 维基百科，自由的百科全书 ... 上树南星属 Anadendrum 龟背竹属 Monstera 白鹤芋属 Spathiphyllum.
龟背芋属或蓬莱蕉属(Monstera)植物有20余种。原产于墨西哥、瓜地马拉．茎伸长后呈蔓性，能附生他物成长。
怪物, 妖怪的英文翻译 ... monster tanker 巨型油轮 monstera [植]蓬莱蕉 monstrance 圣体匣.
龟背芋属( Monstera)*蔓绿绒属(Philodendron)*半夏属(Pinellia)半夏(地文 、三不掉 ) P. ternata (Thunb.)

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, perhaps from Latin monstrum 'monster' (because of the unusual appearance of the leaves in some species)

means.word_mean: 1. any plant of the genus Monstera; often grown as houseplants
2. tropical cylindrical fruit resembling a pinecone with pineapple-banana flavor

auth_sentence.content: Leaves compared The Swiss cheese plant Monstera deliciosa lives in the dark understorey of tropical rainforests.
